description: These burgers are moist, earthy and have a smooth texture
name: Beetroot Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium beetroot, cooked and finely diced
3 cloves garlic, peeled and mashed well
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add the oats and herbs and blend into a flour consistency.
In a mixing bowl, combine the beans with the beetroot, onion, garlic and mash together well.
Now add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients until fully combined.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add the oil to the pan.
Separate your mixture into 4 tightly packed patties and place in the oil and fry for 20 minutes.
Flip the burgers over and fry on the only side for 10 minutes.
Toast your buns under the grill for 3 minutes and then serve with the burgers and cheddar cheese.
